system.sustained: Whilst power is sustained gain one of the following: Immunity to all Poisons, Immunity to extreme temperatures, +10 to any one characteristic except WS and BS, Immunity to Fatigue, or Count as wearing a sealed void suit (although still need to breathe). Each round this power is sustained, must succeed on a Toughness Test, if this test is failed take 1d5 damage that ignores Armour and Toughness. Power can be manifested multiple times simutaneously to gain multiple benefits.
